txt.en:
You see a tiny bird flitting around in Oldheart's vivid memory, chirping happily away as it hops about.

This memory fills you with painful worry. Why is the bird in a memory and not here in the flesh? The worry is Oldheart's... this bird is his friend!

He clearly wants you to find his little bird.
The Ent is worried terribly about a tiny bird. It will certainly be interesting to try to find one bird in the largest forest that you have ever set foot in....
The Ent Oldheart puzzles over some troubled memory.
Oldheart stands in a clearing in the distant reaches of the Black Heart.\n\nYou should speak with Oldheart.
